SELECT goods_type.* FROM sl_goods_type goods_type
LEFT JOIN sl_truck_type_goods_type truck_type_goods_type ON truck_type_goods_type.goods_type_id = goods_type.id
WHERE goods_type.status = 1
AND truck_type_goods_type.truck_type_id = #{truckTypeId}
AND goods_type.name LIKE concat( '%', '${goodsTypeName}', '%' )
ORDER BY goods_type.created DESC
